# Advance Contract Award Notice – Snow Clearing and Feather-out Services

## Background

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) intends to enter into a contract with a qualified supplier for snow clearing and feather-out services at the Resolute Bay Upper Air Weather Station, located in Resolute Bay, Nunavut.

## Objective

The objective of this procurement is to obtain services from a reliable and experienced supplier that can provide snow clearing and feather-out services at the Resolute Bay Upper Air Weather Station. The services will be provided for a period of three (3) years, with two (2) additional one-year option periods.

## Scope of Work

The successful supplier will be responsible for providing all necessary labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and insurance to perform the following tasks:

* Clear snow from the Resolute Bay Upper Air Weather Station to a depth of 10 centimeters;
* Provide additional snow removal services as requested by ECCC staff;
* Use a snowblower to clear snow without creating windrows or snow drifts that may affect meteorological equipment;
* Comply with health and safety regulations;
* Minimize disruption to ECCC staff.

## Language of Work

The language of work will be English.

## Accessibility Considerations

The Government of Canada strives to ensure that the goods and services it procures are inclusive by design and accessible by default, in accordance with the Accessible Canada Act, its associated regulations and standards, as well as the Directive on the Management of Procurement and Policy on the Planning and Management of Investments.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

## Contact Information

For more information or to submit a statement of capabilities, please contact:
Crystal Hendrickson
Procurement and Contracting Specialist
Environment and Climate Change Canada
Email: crystal.hendrickson@ec.gc.ca
Phone: 587-401-7044

## Closing Date and Time

The closing date and time for accepting statements of capabilities is November 30, 2023, at 3:00 p.m. Eastern Time (ET).
